fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
(*Deceive*) 2 uses
- Select two players: chosen player will visit your second target, and will not be notified their visit was switched.

(*Desperate Plea*) / 1 use
- Select yourself, all attackers have their attack value raised by one this night and day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When five people are dead excluding hanging, you will transform into Riot.
